# init(id:feature:)

**Initializer**

Creates a temporal feature.

## Declaration

```swift
init(id: TemporalSegmentIdentifier, feature: Feature)
```

## Parameters

- **id**: The temporal segment identifier.
- **feature**: The feature value.
title: init(id:feature:)
